ygData.subject: RE: SK Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds good (You can still get rid of Voice Graft, wouldn t hurt my feelings at all). The only think I want to say is that it better be a damn nice looking
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds good (You can still get rid of Voice Graft, wouldn't hurt my feelings
at all). The only think I want to say is that it better be a damn nice
looking shield to make me give up how my MM Shield looks (that and the MM
shield has some nice stats as well). Also in regards to the sword, it would
have to have a really nice DMG/Dly ratio, due to the fact that when fighting
in a group in L. Guk or Sol B. it comes down to how much damage you do in
the shortest amount of time (especially when a G. Mino decides he doesn't
like your cleric).

What I would like to see is a sword with identical stats to the Ghoulbane
(just not that damn undead spell, give us a nice DD spell instead, or maybe
a nice effect like Banshee Aura???) that has kind of a black aura
surrounding it (I think someone else mentioned this, kind of like a black
mist that covers us). That would look cool (Hell I gave up my Rubi legs and
went with Steel just because I couldn't stand how the Rubi looked).

Oh and if you do it, make it so those of use past 30 can also get one, I
would hate to miss out on something just because I'm too high a lvl.

Anyway, just my ramblings...

Enjoy

Thom
(Oh and kick would still be nice)..

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 3:35 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] SK Items


From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>

Okay, been perusing the e-mails. Looks like a change to the magic system
isn't going to be happening any time soon because there doesn't seem to be
consensus within the SK community as to which spells suck and which don't
:-)

So to help out human and DE SKs, what about a shield/1HS combo acquirable
around 25th or 30th level through questing that gives you a significant
amount of protection (to make up for lack of HP compared to Ogre/SK) and
damage (think of an Anti-Ghoulbane)?

And for you troll/ogre SKs, there are other goodies going in for you too :-)

Brian


-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
